function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceptions of COVID-19 as a travel-associated risk leading to a planned shift in typical travel behaviors.","Impact":"Massive impact on the tourism industry due to changes in individual behavior plans, affecting international tourism collectively.","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns to provide accurate information about travel risks and safety measures, implementing stringent health protocols in travel and hospitality services.","Technologies":"Health screening technology at airports, contactless services in hospitality, digital health passports for travelers.","People":"Tourists, travelers, hospitality industry workers, international aviation staff.","Owner":"Government agencies, tourism boards, hospitality businesses, aviation industry."},{"Description":"Correlation between COVID-19 risk and travel anxiety, leading to the omission of vacations, reduced international travel, and increased domestic travel.","Impact":"Reduction in international travel, economic impact on global tourism, increased pressure on domestic tourism infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Mental health support for travelers, promoting local and domestic tourism, implementing health and safety certifications for travel destinations.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support, virtual travel experiences, digital health tracking for travelers.","People":"Tourists, travelers, mental health professionals, domestic tourism operators.","Owner":"Mental health organizations, tourism boards, local government authorities."},{"Description":"Potential risk of restoring international tourism without addressing COVID-19 travel anxiety and risks, leading to a resurgence of contagious diseases and travel-related transmission.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases across borders, potential for new waves of infections, strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust health screening and testing protocols for international travelers, vaccination requirements, international coordination on disease control measures.","Technologies":"Advanced health screening technologies, digital vaccination passports, real-time disease tracking and monitoring systems.","People":"International travelers, healthcare workers, border control authorities, public health organizations.","Owner":"International health organizations, government agencies, border control authorities."}]}
